mapinfo.detailsText:
Players start at the top and the bottom of a badlands desert divided by a big mesa.
 Resources are plentiful but scattered all over this open region.
 A long trade route crosses the center of the map from west to east.
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCivs: Apache / Navajo 
 -Mercenaries: Renegado / Comanchero 
 
--------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
